name: 1D Platformer
description: Welcome to the world's first 1D platformer. You are a 1 dimensional creature trying to return home, but there's a lot of nasty creatures out there trying to stop you. Luckily you have the unique ability to phase through everyone in your path! You can only move left or right- but you might want to heavily consider moving right! Short game made for the GMTK 2019 Jam.
